title: SUGGESTION: Ability to check CS/min at given intervals in MH
body:
I really like the new Match History but it could use a little more, I don't think it would be too hard to implement this either.
Basically at say, 5 minute intervals, you can hover over to see what your cs is at 5, 10, 15 minutes. 

This will be based only on the cs you have gotten during the 5 minute interval (1:30-5 for first 5 minutes as minions have not spawned) so you can keep a rough record of how well you cs throughout the early, early-mid and midgame etc.

replies.body: Yeah i like the idea for sure
